overview.title: Justice Systems Implementation Framework
overview.subtitle: Overview
overview.paragraph1: The Justice Systems Implementation Framework is a comprehensive, adaptable blueprint for transforming global justice systems. It integrates restorative justice, indigenous legal traditions, and innovative technologies to create sustainable, equitable, and resilient justice systems.
overview.paragraph2: This framework reimagines global justice systems as transparent, inclusive, and effective, with goals to increase public trust by 25%, achieve 80% fair access to justice, and resolve 70% of cases without escalation to higher courts by 2035.
